name: Pixi Poxi Autorunner Lab
description:
Embark on an epic escape adventure in "Pixi Poxi," a heart-pounding autorunner platform game that will push the boundaries of your gaming skills. Assume the role of Pixi, a courageous test subject. Your mission: to break free from the clutches of the crazy scientist, Poxi, and reclaim your lost humanity.




Key Features:
  • Challenging Gameplay: "Pixi Poxi" is an exhilarating autorunner platform game that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking as you guide Pixi through a series of levels.
  • Uncover the Dark Story: Dive into the narrative as you strive to break free from the clutches of Poxi, the deranged scientist, and regain your humanity.
  • Pixel Art Aesthetics: Immerse yourself in the nostalgic charm of retro-style pixel art graphics that bring the world of "Pixi Poxi" to life.
  • Masterful Maneuvers: Survive the increasingly difficult levels by mastering the art of jumping and swift movement.


    Prepare to be kept on the edge of your seat with unexpected twists and turns at every corner. "Pixi Poxi" isn't just a game; it's an adrenaline-pumping journey that will test your mettle and determination. Do you have what it takes to help Pixi escape the clutches of Poxi's malevolent experiments and return to their human form?

    Follow us in our Discord community for news and development progress.
